website_summaries.verdict: An ideal option for small businesses or entrepreneurs who want an affordable credit card reader that still performs well and keeps data safe.
pros: Swipes cards accurately while encrypting all data
cons: Not as portable as some brands, but still very convenient

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Easy. Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with an online software system. Never had an issue after consistently using for months. I bought three more and all work great.
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: upgrade for my POS systems at work
customer_reviews.text: got these readers for 3 POS systems up at work....they are awesomely reliable and fast at reading......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Been using in an office setting many times a day for 9 months now. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Fair and Unbiased

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Received one not programmed for a simple CC transaction. Time spent to get it installed/troubleshooting and calls to Magtech resulted in a refusal for a return under window of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Workman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item thinking it would be better than the $20.00 swiper I purchased 2 years ago. It only worked for for a few weeks and then it would only work sometimes, then it completely stopped working. Thought it was the cord, or the USB port but it was not. Of course as of 1 1/2 weeks ago, I am unable to return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Varney

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can work with encryption
customer_reviews.text: If your iOS can work with an encrypted swiper it's great. If you need something unencrypted, it just won't work. Looks nice and I would have loved it if it worked, but it doesn't play well with my OS.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know what configuration settings you need and get the correct one.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with my system and Magtek want to charge me to reconfigure for my POS system. Total ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and has the right specs. Look forward to using it for my business.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered, Great Prices
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, Great Prices and Fast Delivery + Happy Customer! This MagTek was exacted what I needed and at a very good price. Product arrived and was quickly installed to a computer and works great. I am very happy and satisfied with this SFT Store on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gonzalez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Elections
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner, bought to replace broken scanner used in elections, worked great, plug-n-play, larger precinct, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlyn Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I tried 2 other ones that didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I tried 2 other ones that didn't work so I went back to this exact model and it was plug and play with no hiccups at all!
customer_reviews.author: GlockFu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy this product as it is the least expensive one on the market however I went ahead and ordered it. I upgraded to the one day shipping as we needed to replace a broken one as soon as possible. It arrived on Saturday as requested and easily attached and immediately started working! I was extremely pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Casey VanVleck

customer_reviews.title: Swiper is incorrectly picking up numbers and names
customer_reviews.text: Incorrectly picking up names and numbers---have to swipe two or three times before it correctly reads a card.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Ristau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: too easy...just plug it in...nothing else to do. works great with quickbooks online.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with QuickBooks Online. There was virtually no setup - easy USB connection. QB's recognized instantly and was able to swipe credit cards immediately.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic. I'm able to scan credit card quickly and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. I'm able to scan credit card quickly and easily. It connects right into a USB port on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Soccermom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with our PC and Quickbooks. Easy to set up - just plug into a USB port
customer_reviews.author: Shereen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly out of the box, cheaper than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly out of the box, cheaper than the others. worked for me in Win 7 / 8/ 10 at different locations
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: all we had to do was plug it in & it worked. arrived on time & works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plug n play as described! Replaced an older swiper ...
customer_reviews.text: Plug n play as described! Replaced an older swiper that had stopped reading and just unplugged old, plugged in this one. Flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Bass Face

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first...
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my card processor. Worked at first, but won't even register now. Waste of money. $60 paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: It has stopped working exactly after 30 days when return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: zulfiqar ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These MSRs always work as described and are very reliable. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RyBan

customer_reviews.title: Unable to Use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know about this Level 3 encryption. Sending back to get Level 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it again.
customer_reviews.text: The second one I have purchased for my company in our expansion.
customer_reviews.author: Ced Lorch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good credit card scanner for any office. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: C Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to add more computers with cashiering capabilities! Much cheaper too! Shipped quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product and quite a bit cheaper than the same thing from our credit card provider
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play....easy to setup. Swipes super easy. It has a green light on it. One star deducted because there's no beeping noise indicating that the card swiped okay. Overall I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Malina Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, item was shipped to me within a day or so!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.text: Died within 60 days of using it and is 30 days past the return date. Expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price......great product......
customer_reviews.text: Just plug it in and go! No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: socialworker10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speedy Delivery and upon first try worked like a charm! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product and just what we needed to get our credit cards swiped !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By the time my program was hooked up and I ...
customer_reviews.text: By the time my program was hooked up and I tried to use these, and they would not work. they would not read the correct card numbers. I tried to return but was told that it was too late. now I have 2 of these that I am unable to use and unable to resale because they do not work. very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tech support was very helpful when i had trouble with activation.
customer_reviews.author: LISA REIM

customer_reviews.title: It did not work. Need to order another one ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not work. Need to order another one. Not sure if I should tried the same company. It could only be a defective one? I have one that works but this one did not and I need two for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Claude

customer_reviews.title: Confirm your security/encryption before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this item, make sure of your 'security/encryption' needs of your software vendor. These are Sec 2 and I need Sec 3. We were setting up a new branch and didn't install within the 30 day window so now I have three Sec 2 that are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Need to purchase from credit card processor to get correct encryption
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Only recommended reader by PaySimple Merchant Services and it will not ...
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK WITH CHIP CARDS!!!! Only recommended reader by PaySimple Merchant Services and it will not process chip cards which then have to be physically keyed in (and costs more, of course)
customer_reviews.author: DH Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first unit that I purchased did not work straight from the box. So I got another one. It worked great for 3 months and then it stopped working. Don't buy it's a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Anuszkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Initially had trouble getting this to synch with my computer but works well now.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Davisson

customer_reviews.title: Does not read properly
customer_reviews.text: First, there are no instructions with this -- it is supposedly "plug and play." I've got it plugged in and it does read portions of cards we run (Debit and Credit cards. The problem is that it only reads the first four and last four digits, the middle eight numbers are always all zeroes. So we are stil left entering in numbers manually. If you are looking for a swiper to use with credit and debit cards, you'll want to pass on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: MagTek 21073062 Dynamag Magnesafe Triple Track Magnetic Stripe Swipe Reader with 6' USB Interface Cable, 5V, Black
product_meta.description: MagTek triple track magnetic stripe reader with 6-feet USB interface cable. Triple track magnetic stripe track configuration. Hardware compatible with a PC or any computer or terminal having a USB interface. Bi-directional card reading. Reads encoded data that meets ANSI/ISO/AAMVA standards. Reads up to three tracks of card data. Secure red/green/amber LED for status. Compatible with USB specification and HID specification. Can use standard windows HID driver for communications. Programmable USB serial number descriptor. Programmable USB interrupt in endpoint polling interval. Programmable keyboard table to support alternate languages. Non-volatile memory for property storage. Detachable USB cable using standard USB Micro-B connector. Supplies 54 byte Magneprint value. Contains a unique, non-changeable serial number which allows tracking each reader. Encrypts all track data and the MagnePrint value. Provides clear text confirmation data including card holder's name, expiration date, and a portion of the PAN as part of the masked track data. Interfaces/ports: USB 2.0 USB, PS/2 keyboard wedge. Magnetic stripe track number: track 1, track 2, track 3. Interfaces/ports: USB 2.0 USB and PS/2 keyboard wedge. Environmental conditions- operating temperature: -22 to 158 degrees F and storage temperature -40 to 158 degrees F. Humidity: 10 to 90 percent non-condensing operating. Certifications and standards: ISO 7810, ISO 7811, AAMVA.
